title: Tender for the Supply of 450,000 Vials of Biphasic Isophane Insulin BP 1000IU/10ml - MSD / P / 15 / 12 / S - DHS / C / P / 323 / 2012
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health to award the above tender, on the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), to the only responsive bidder for a total price of US$ 922,500.00 (LKR 105,073,920.00 ), was approved by the Cabinet.
